member.name: T:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator
member.summary: class containing methods for calculation such as: addition, subtraction, multiplication and division

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Add(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: method to add any two integer type numbers
member.returns: returns result of addition of two numbers

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Subtract(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: method to subtract an integer type number from another
member.returns: returns result of subtraction of two numbers

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Multiply(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: method to multiply any two integer type numbers
member.returns: returns result of multiplication of two numbers

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Divide(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: method to divide an integer type number by another
member.returns: returns result of division of two numbers
